turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was looking to order some pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted three small pizzas, one meat lovers, one chicken barbecue, and one chicken bacon ranch.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd also like all of those with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what was the first one again?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: SO I have 3 small pizzas with extra cheese, one chicken bbq, one meatlovers, and one chicken bacon ranch. IS that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, you said those had extra cheese, all right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes all three have extra cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, awesome. Yeah, that will be it for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total is $38.50, it'll be ready in 30 minutes.
